text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (EU Digital 

Covid Certificates) (Revocation) Regulations 2023.

title: 1972), and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU) 2021/953
heading: 2. The following are revoked:
text_raw:
2. The following are revoked: 

(a) 

(b) 

the European Union (EU Digital Covid Certificates) Regulations 
2021 (S.I. No. 318 of 2021); 

the European Union 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 182 of 2022). 

(EU Digital Covid Certificates) 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 August, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations serve to revoke S.I. No. 318 of 2021 and S.I. 182 of 2022.
